name: Shadow Guardian
storyline: Is about Jason Call, a captive of the villainous Novik who is being forced to recall memories about a mystical relic.
summary:
A new hero has been born. His name is Jason Call and this game tells his story.
The mysterious Prima Materia, a powerful and precious relic that has been at the center of secret legends for many millennia, has become a real threat. Hidden in a remote temple, it is sought by a group of dangerous mercenaries who want to gain its power and enslave the rest of humanity.
There is one hope and that is you.
Get ready to experience one of the most magnificent and charming adventure games, thanks to shader effects and the highest level of graphic detail and animation ever achieved in Gameloft games.
Take on epic quests with an intriguing scenario. From ancient Egyptian ruins and underwater temples to the frozen Antarctic plains, explore the world and avoid enemy armies that are literally on your heels. Find the Prima Materia and save the world.
